title: Thai lentil coconut curry
ingredients: ['cooking oil spray', '1/2 red onion, sliced', '1 stick celery, sliced', '1 clove garlic, finely chopped', '1 tablespoon red curry paste', '1 sweet potato, diced', '90g red lentils', '250ml vegetable stock', '1 courgette, diced', '125ml light coconut milk', "100g rice, cooked according to packet's instructions", 'fresh coriander, chopped']
